name: 呼吸與循環生理學
description: 介紹哺乳動物體內呼吸與循環
goals: 介紹哺乳動物體內呼吸與循環
syllabus:
Lung structure and ventilation

Gas exchange and pulmonary circulation

Respiratory mechanics

Ventilation-perfusion relationship

Gas transport

Neural control of respiratory I

Neural control of respiratory II

Acid-base balance

期中考

Cardiac electrophysiology

Cardiac pump

Heart rate

Pressure

Arterial system

Cardiac output and venous return

Control of cardiovascular system I

Control of cardiovascular system II

期末考
